name: @xoxoharsh/multiparser
description: A Text extracting package docx, pdf and pptx files

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch: git add . && git commit -m "patch update" && npm run version:patch
scripts.publish:minor: git add . && git commit -m "minor update" && npm run version:minor
scripts.publish:major: git add . && git commit -m "major update" && npm run version:major

author: Yash Mittal, Rajat Bhati, Harsh Sharma
